recruitT01FirstTouch: Hey {prospectName}, it's {senderFirst}. I'm using an app to help friends launch with {companyName}. Quick look? {shortLink}
recruitT01FirstTouchNoName: Hey, it's {senderFirst}. I'm using an app to help friends launch with {companyName}. Quick look? {shortLink}
recruitT02FollowUpWarm: Hi {prospectName}! Following up on {companyName}. I saw great results this week. Have time for a quick chat? {shortLink}
recruitT03DeadlineNudge: {prospectName}, spots are filling up for our {companyName} launch. Want me to save you one? {shortLink}
recruitT04TeamNeeded: {remaining, plural, =0 {You're day-one ready.} one {You're # person away from a strong start.} other {You're # people away from a strong start.}}
recruitT05MilestoneReached: ðŸŽ‰ {prospectName}, you hit your first milestone with {companyName}! Your team is growing. Keep it up!
recruitT06WelcomeOnboard: Welcome, {prospectName}! I'm {senderFirst} and here to help. Let's get started: {inviteLink}
recruitT07WeeklyCheckIn: Hey {prospectName}, quick check-in on {companyName}. How are things going? Any questions I can help with?
recruitT08Deadline: We kick off in {days, plural, one {# day} other {# days}}. Want me to hold your spot? {shortLink}
recruitT09ResourceShare: {prospectName}, I found this helpful for {companyName}. Thought you'd want to see it: {inviteLink}
recruitT10InviteReminder: Hi {prospectName}, you still have an invite waiting for {companyName}. Ready to join? {shortLink}
recruitT11TeamGrowth: Great news, {prospectName}! Your {companyName} team grew this week. You're making real progress!
recruitT12Encouragement: {prospectName}, building with {companyName} takes time. You're doing great. Keep going!
recruitT13TrainingInvite: Hey {prospectName}, we have a {companyName} training session coming up. Want to join? {inviteLink}
recruitT14QuickWin: Nice work, {prospectName}! That was a solid win with {companyName}. Let's keep the momentum going!
recruitT15SupportOffer: Hey {prospectName}, I'm here if you need help with {companyName}. Just reach out anytime.
recruitT16Gratitude: Thanks for being part of our {companyName} team, {prospectName}. Your energy makes a difference!
